|brand = Google |model = Coral |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Dev Board |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = development board, single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = A4R-1701AA1 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = NXP;i.MX8MQ;MIMX8MQ6DVA; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_cores2 = 1 |cpu1_total_cores = 5 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1_type2 = ARM |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-M4 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz |cpu1spd2 = 266 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GETF-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT53E256M32D2DS-053 WT; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211FD; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 7C:D9:5C |oui = 48:EB:62
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2019.04.1;; |stockos = Linux;4.14.98-imx;Mendel Linux;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 3.0 (Type C), Micro SD Card slot |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = USB (Type C)
|serial = yes,, USB Female Micro-B,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.1 BLE, AI Accelerator, HDMI 2.0a, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, Audio 3.5 mm jack, microphone, I2C, SPI, UART, GPIO, |addchip = Programmable PMIC;Rohm;BD71837;;1;,,, Google Edge TPU ML Accelerator Module;Coral;G313-06329-00;;1;,,, Crypto Authentication Device;Microchip;ATECC608A;;1;,,, Triple/Quad Output PMIC;Renesas;ISL9130B;;1;,,, Multi-Channel Audio Hub/CODEC;Realtek;ALC5645;;1;,,, Single Chip USB to Dual UART Bridge;Silicon Labs;CP2105;;1;,,, Digital High-SNR SiSonic Microphone;Knowles Electronics;SPK0415;;1;,,, 6-String 43V White LED Driver with Boost Regulator;Richtek;RT8532;;1;,,, Charge Pump Controller with Automatic Mode Transition;Richtek;RT9397BF;;1;,,, Dual 1A, 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;Diodes Inc;AP3427M;;1;,,, 4 Amp Over-Voltage Protection IC;Kinitec Tech;KTS1681;;1;,,, 3.5MHz High Efficiency Step-Up Converter;TI;TPS61253;;1;,,, 8-Bit Bidirectional Level-Shifting Voltage Translator;TI;TXS0108E;;1;,,, USB PD And Type C Current-Limited Power Switch;NXP;NX5P3090;;1;,,, USB Type-C SuperSpeed Active Switch;NXP;PTN36043;;1;,,, Dual Channel EMI Filter w/Integrated ESD Protection;Nexperia;PCMF2HDMI2S;;1;,,, Triple Channel EMI Filter w/Integrated ESD Protection;Nexperia;PCMF3HDMI2S;;1;,,, Dual Channel EMI Filter w/Integrated Bidirectional ESD Protection;Nexperia;PCMF2USB;;1;,,, Triple Channel EMI Filter w/Integrated Bidirectional ESD Protection;Nexperia;PCMF3USB;;2;,,, Configuration Channel Logic for Type C Connection;NXP;PTN5150;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = mendel |defaultpass = mendel |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/20/2019 |estreldate = 03/2019 |estprice = 150 |upc = 193575000077 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAMBFAGG6610 |asin = B07QF582TG |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Murata LBEE5U91CQ |rad1modif = SD (module) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;QCA6174A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = integrated |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[NXP]]'' [https://www.nxp.com/products/processors-and-microcontrollers/arm-processors/i-mx-applications-processors/i-mx-8-processors/i-mx-8m-family-armcortex-a53-cortex-m4-audio-voice-video:i.MX8M i.MX8MQ] (Quad core) :4x [[ARM]] (Cortex-A53) @1.85GHz :1x [[ARM]] (Cortex-M4F) @266MHz *GPU: ''Vivante'' GC7000 Lite :4Kp60 HEVC/H.265, H.264, H.263, VP9 Decoder :1080p60 MPEG2, MPEG4p2, VC-1, VP8, AVS, MJPEG *TPU: ''Google Edge'' ML Accelerator Co-processor *Storage: 8GB eMMC flash + Micro SD (TF) slot *RAM: 1GB (LPDDR4) *WLAN: 802.11abgn/ac (2T2R) *USB: 1x USB 3.2 (Gen 1) Type-A, :1x USB 3.2 (Gen 1) Type-C (OTG) *Power Source: USB Type-C
===Requirement=== *USB Type-C cable with data transfer function *Monitor with HDMI cable, Keyboard and Mouse set *5V USB Type-C Power Supply
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2019/03/04/buy-google-edge-tpu-coral-development-board-usb-accelerator/ ''Google to Launch Edge TPU Powered Coral Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/google-launches-i-mx8m-dev-board-with-edge-tpu-ai-chip/ ''Google launches i.MX8M dev board with Edge TPU AI chip'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
